content: the **strawberry granny square** is the first square of the tutti frutti granny square collection the strawberry is crocheted inside the granny square so there are no appliques to attach or sew the pdf pattern comes with written instructions a step-by-step photo tutorial and a link to the video tutorial *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 4 5-mm e/4 usa 9 uk hook aran 4 medium weight yarn tapestry needle **yarn** i used paintbox yarns wool mix aran 1 and paintbox yarns simply aran 2 in the following colors **a** 1 blush pink 853 **b** 2 lime green 228 **c** 2 champagne white 202 **size** 4 10 cm **gauge** this pattern is too small to accurately determine the gauge **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
